casebody.data:
Philip GORDON, Appellant, v. Thaddeus B. KLECKNER, Appellee. No. 101. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 27, 1942. Nathan B. Fogelson, of New York City, for appellant. N. William Welling, of New York City, for appellee.

Before SWAN, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed on the opinion below, In re Gordon, 44 F.Supp. 581.
